item.description:
Hello PP2012 People!

Just a quick summary of the last meeting. You all should now have in your hot little hands a copy of the goal setting worksheet. You clearly stated your goals for 2012 to the group and now it is time to put them down in writing. Find it here: http://files.meetup.com/120247/PhotoGoal%20Setting%20Handout.pdf

 

As you are writing them down, be sure to put how you are going to make that goal happen. Give yourself deadline dates to make each step happen. Hold yourself to them - with out excuses.

 

You are then emailing me your goal worksheet. Because sharing it with all of us will help us hold you accountable to the ideas and goals you want to achieve.

 

There were 20 people at this event and I am expecting 20 goal sheets emailed to me by Feb 19th. Please RSVP by the 19th for this meeting.

 

We meet on the 20th at 7pm at Jeff's Studio. I look forward to seeing your progress. We will discuss any challenges you may have encountered putting your goals into writing and we will have time to brain storm ways to help you with your challenges. Please keep an open mind.

 

I am thinking that the first person to send me a completed form (goals, dates, and how to) should get to pick a book from the Focal Press web site as their reward for this first step.

 

Yep- I think that would be a nice reward. (I know you are thinking...wait there are rewards? and to this I say- YEP!)

 

Cheers,

Donna
item.how_to_find_us: Walk in the room to the right as you enter from the parking lot.

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: Photography Projects for 2012- 2nd meeting
